alert.note: Alert for Juniata; Perry; Snyder (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 27 at 12:50PM EDT until May 27 at 1:15PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Juniata County in central Pennsylvania... Northeastern Perry County in south central Pennsylvania... Snyder County in central Pennsylvania... * Until 115 PM EDT. * At 1250 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mcalisterville, moving north at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Mount Pleasant Mills, Paxtonville and Fremont around 100 PM EDT. Penns Creek, Kreamer and Kratzerville around 110 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Beavertown, Thompsontown, Freeburg, Millerstown and East Salem. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
